message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $12,000 at a competitive price.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to buy your product. However, I'm only willing to pay $10,500.  This price is fair considering the product's value, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. However, I must maintain my minimum price to ensure profitability. I am willing to negotiate further, but I cannot go below $11,000 for the product. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
